The team Projects Articles Features
Icarus Productions is a group of 7 highly-skilled youth who are full of new ideas. We have done several projects for the TI-8x calculators (Z80 Asm), the Game Boy ColorTM and the PC and we're always working on new programs & games.

Attention Publishers: learn more about us and our programs here.
